body:
This represents the official release of Apicurio Studio, version 0.2.4.Final.

The following issues have been resolved in this release:

* [#252](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/252) Downloading yaml, get an error in json
* [#249](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/249) Publish API: Implement a feature to publish an API to GitHub/Lab/Bucket
* [#248](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/248) UI: Include patternfly css and js via .angular-cli.json
* [#238](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/238) Set limits on Openshift Deployment Configs
* [#236](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/236) API Editor: Create component for "code editor"
* [#231](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/231) API Listing: Multi-select + Delete results in an error
* [#222](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/222) Back-End: Support branches in GitHub/GitLab/Bitbucket
* [#208](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/208) Page Not Found error when trying to open an existent model from github.
* [#183](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/183) API Editor: deleting a selected path doesn't deselect it
* [#177](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/177) API Editor: delete operations from the Path Form
* [#175](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/175) API Editor: add "trace" operation when editing 3.0 path item
* [#163](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/163) Parent: Innovation Days
* [#107](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/107) API Editor: support GFM in appropriate description fields
* [#100](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/100) Support multiple code hosting services
* [#89](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/89) API Editor: Allow configuring global security requirements
* [#85](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/85) Support creating new APIs without tying to github projects
* [#60](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/60) Documentation: start new documentation using GitBook
* [#53](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/53) Add Existing API: Use GH Search to show suggestions
* [#51](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/51) Create New API: Suggest a location+name for OpenAPI doc
* [#17](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/17) Set up Webpack
* [#7](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/7) Create API Page: Validate that the API definition exists (or can be added) in github
* [#3](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/3) Determine if a "standalone" angular 2 component can be used in a non-angular2 app
* [#2](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/2) Confirm that a "standalone" angular 2 component can be easily used in project Y (and how)
* [#1](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/1) Create a simple "api editor" component in angular 2 for testing purposes


For more information, please see the Apicurio Studio's official project site:

* [General Information](http://www.apicur.io/)
* [Download/Quickstart](http://www.apicur.io/download)
* [Blog](http://www.apicur.io/blog)
name: Beta 2.4
